                                                                              double gridSize)
        creates measuring points for accessibility computation
        Parameters:
        minX - The smallest x coordinate (easting, longitude) expected
        minY - The smallest y coordinate (northing, latitude) expected
        maxX - The largest x coordinate (easting, longitude) expected
        maxY - The largest y coordinate (northing, latitude) expected
        gridSize -
        Returns:
        ActivityFacilitiesImpl containing the coordinates for the measuring points
